title: Eco-Friendly Duplex with Historic Old Town Views and Family Perks
description: Nestled in the picturesque Old Town of Krosno, this spacious duplex combines classic charm with contemporary comforts. Offering 4 generous bedrooms, 3 modern bathrooms, and approximately 175 sqm of well-planned living space, this home invites warm gatherings and family relaxation. Enjoy an open-plan kitchen and living area overlooking a private, easy-care garden—perfect for summer barbecues and outdoor games. Energy-efficient solutions and natural finishes throughout the property ensure environmentally conscious living without compromising on comfort.
neighborhood_description: Live amid Krosno's historic Old Town, where cobblestone streets, heritage architecture, and friendly neighbors create a storybook setting for families. Nearby parks, schools, and charming local shops are all within reach, while a nearby highway makes regional commutes easy without disrupting the peaceful atmosphere. The low urban development allows you and your family to retreat from the city's rush, letting you enjoy the genuinely warm, family-friendly neighborhood vibe.
target_buyer: Perfect for eco-conscious families seeking a harmonious blend of character, community, and modern amenities, especially those who value historic charm and private green space.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity within Krosno’s most scenic Old Town quarter, placing this duplex at a sweet spot for family-oriented buyers desiring sustainability and tranquility in a historical yet convenient setting.
